title: On the regularity of static axially symmetric solutions in SU(2) Yang-Mills-dilaton theory
abstract: The regularity of static axially symmetric solutions in SU(2) Yang-Mills-dilaton theory is examined. We show that the solutions obtained previously within a singular Ansatz for the non-abelian gauge field can be gauge transformed into a regular form. The local form of the gauge transformation is given on the singular axis and at the origin.
